snippet: With Brooklyn making its bid to host the 2016 Democratic National Convention, borough boosters are already getting set to roll out the red carpet. Here’s a rough draft of the welcoming committee’s visitors’ guide.
abstract: With Brooklyn making its bid to host the 2016 Democratic National Convention, borough boosters are already getting set to roll out the red carpet. Here’s a rough draft of the welcoming committee’s visitors’ guide.

headline.main: A Rough Guide to Brooklyn for Conventioneers
